com.risk.model

Class GamePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.GamePlay

  • public class GamePlay
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represents the Game Play state at any point of time.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Apoorv Semwal, Zinnia Rana
